TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PopupWindow extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: This class represents a popup window that can be used to display an arbitrary view.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.AnimationStyle : int with get, set
public virtual int AnimationStyle { get; set; }
.property instance int32 AnimationStyle

Docs.param: animation style to use when the popup appears and disappears. Set to -1 for the default animation, 0 for no animation, or a resource identifier for an explicit animation.
Docs.summary: Return the animation style to use the popup appears and disappears -or- Change the animation style resource for this popup.
Docs.value: the animation style to use the popup appears and disappears

public virtual bool AttachedInDecor { get; set; }
.property instance bool AttachedInDecor

Docs.param: true if the popup should be attached to the decor frame of its parent window.
Docs.summary: Indicates whether the popup window will be attached in the decor frame of its parent window. -or- This will attach the popup window to the decor frame of the parent window to avoid overlaping with screen decorations like the navigation bar.
Docs.value: true if the window will be attached to the decor frame of its parent window.

MemberSignature.Value: member this.IsAboveAnchor : bool
public virtual bool IsAboveAnchor { get; }
.property instance bool IsAboveAnchor

Docs.summary: Indicates whether the popup is showing above (the y coordinate of the popup's bottom is less than the y coordinate of the anchor) or below the anchor view (the y coordinate of the popup is greater than y coordinate of the anchor's bottom).
Docs.value: True if this popup is showing above the anchor view, false otherwise.
